  • Method Details

    • setState

      public static void setState(String _state)

    • updateState

      public void updateState()
      Updates the state based on the user's input and enables or disables the state combo box accordingly.

    • btnClick

      public void btnClick() throws Exception
      Performs the appropriate action when the button is clicked.
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an error accessing the database

    • getMouseClick

      public void getMouseClick()
      This function is triggered when the user clicks on a row in the table. It retrieves the selected Customer object from the TableView, and populates the form fields with the customer's information if the application is in either "Update" or "Delete" state.

    • initialize

      public void initialize() throws SQLException
      This function is executed when the FXML file is loaded. It sets up the TableView to display Customer records, and populates the ComboBox with the available country options.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error accessing the database

    • disableElements

      public void disableElements()
      This function is called to disable all input elements in the AnchorPane. It retrieves all the Node objects with the CSS class "input" and sets their disable property to true.

    • removeTextFromFields

      public void removeTextFromFields()

    • back

      public void back() throws Exception
      This function is called when the user clicks the "Back" button in the UI. It switches the scene to the homepage.fxml file.
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an error accessing the file
